channel.title: Comments on: Yellow Day

item.title: By: alma vogt
item.dc:creator: alma vogt
item.description: Thanks for another very cute video showing a day in the life of your beautiful daughter. Aunt Alma
item.content:encoded:
Thanks for another very cute video showing a day in the life of your beautiful daughter.
Aunt Alma

item.title: By: great auntie linny
item.dc:creator: great auntie linny
item.description: I LOVE these videos. She is walking---OMG. Give her kisses and hugs from Auntie Linny and Uncle George....we miss you guys Love ya
item.content:encoded: I LOVE these videos. She is walking—OMG. Give her kisses and hugs from Auntie Linny and Uncle George….we miss you guys Love ya
